SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.types

Class AbstractTranslatorsMap<C extends FDSConfig,D>

java.lang.Object
io.github.jy95.fds.common.types.AbstractTranslatorsMap<C,D>
Type Parameters:
C - the type of configuration extending FDSConfig
D - the type of dosage field handled by the translators
Direct Known Subclasses:
TranslatorsMapR4, TranslatorsMapR5
public abstract class AbstractTranslatorsMap<C extends FDSConfig,D> extends Object
Abstract class representing a map of translators for various DisplayOrder values. This class provides a mechanism to retrieve an Translator based on the specified display order.
Author:
jy95

  • Constructor Details

    • AbstractTranslatorsMap

      public AbstractTranslatorsMap(Map<DisplayOrder,Supplier<Translator<C,D>>> translatorSuppliers)
      Constructs a new AbstractTranslatorsMap with the specified supplier map.
      Parameters:

  • Method Details

    • getTranslator

      public Translator<C,D> getTranslator(DisplayOrder displayOrder)
      Retrieves the Translator associated with the specified DisplayOrder. The translator is created lazily on first access.
      Parameters:
      displayOrder - the DisplayOrder used to locate the translator
      Returns:
      the corresponding Translator, or null if no match is found
